content: I've received a request to provide a CDA R2 training for a Saudi customer. I'll dust off my old CDA materials (I havent presented them for quite a while), but it would be nice to use a Saudi CDA IG as an example IG (preferrably a clinically oriented / non-financial use case IG). Does anybody have any pointers as to where I'd be able to find Saudi IGs and CDA instance examples ?
